title: Redfern Beach (D)
creator_credit: AFTRS, Rachel Roberts, Yvonne Maden and Catriona McKenzie
brief_description: An islander Max (Michael Huahihe) finds himself working at a fish processing plant and struggles to be accepted. Unsure of the violent lifestyle, he attempts to move on once given perspective when befriended by Harry (Tony Barry), a local fisherman and his new lover, Phaedra.
creator_credit_for_label: AFTRS, Rachel Roberts, Yvonne Maden and Catriona McKenzie
